page.title: 13THE LOCAL ENVIRONMENT
page.content: We asked people if there was anything that they disliked about the local environment. In such a pretty village as Alderton it is not surprising that most people were satisfied with their surroundings. However, there were some complaints. Surprisingly 5 people complained about the noise of traffic and 3 mentioned low-flying aircraft as a nuisance. Two people felt isolated and this was endorsed by 2 more who complained of poor bus services. Four wrote that the people were not as friendly as they might be and one complained of the manners of some children. The single complaint about a lack of street lights has some hope of remedy one concerning the weather has not! There was a lot of concern that future building development should be restricted.
